data.liq_desc: 4th Liquidity Position as at 28 August 2025 (RM mil)
data.liq_rem:
OPERATIONS:

BNM revised Murabahah overnight tender from RM20.5 billion to RM20.8 billion.


CONVENTIONAL MM TENDER
RM22,300 mil for 1 day: COMPETITIVE BORROWING 29/08/2025


MURABAHAH MM TENDER
RM20,800 mil for 1 day: COMPETITIVE BORROWING 29/08/2025


All offers must be submitted before 1630hrs
